nodes.text: Local 253 was a sector of the Moisture Farmers of Tatooine. Ardon Crell represented Local 253 in Jabba the Hutt's palace, in exchange for men to protect them from Tusken Raiders.

The Local 253 chapter was created for the lore on the card for Ardon "Vapor" Crell in the Star Wars Customizable Card Game. The number 253 is an Easter egg reference to the game's maker, Decipher, Inc., whose address was 253 Granby St, Norfolk, VA.
